title: Introducing GPT-5
raw_excerpt: We are introducing GPT‑5, our best AI system yet. GPT‑5 is a significant leap in intelligence over all our previous models, featuring state-of-the-art performance across coding, math, writing, health, visual perception, and more.
raw_body: We are introducing GPT‑5, our best AI system yet. GPT‑5 is a significant leap in intelligence over all our previous models, featuring state-of-the-art performance across coding, math, writing, health, visual perception, and more.
speedrun: GPT-5 is the latest AI model, outperforming previous versions in various tasks.
why_it_matters: Represents a major advancement in AI technology.
Enhances capabilities in multiple fields like coding and health.

lenses.eli12: GPT-5 is a new AI that is smarter than older versions. It can do many things better, like math and writing.
lenses.pm: Users may include developers and businesses seeking advanced AI solutions. The market for AI is growing rapidly, with competition increasing. Risks include potential misuse and ethical concerns.
lenses.engineer: GPT-5 likely uses advanced algorithms and large datasets for training. Constraints may involve computational limits and data quality. The exact methods and architecture remain unspecified.
